channel.title: Pages on Alex Katopodis
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Alex Katopodis

item.title: Code
item.author: alex_at_katopod.is (Alex Katopodis)
item.description: k2e Browse your kindle clippings and export them to evernote. web | github GithubEmoji A Sublime Text 3 plugin for inserting github emoji in markdown documents. Also supports commit message emoji package control | github Labstrap A mediawiki theme built for the tolabaki hackerspace, based on the strapping theme. web | git Salty fox A micro-IDE and AST viewer for the MetaOCaml-inspired fox interpreted metalanguage. web (Note that salty fox is chrome only and needs the chrome://flags/#enable-nacl flag to be enabled)

item.title: Presentations
item.author: alex_at_katopod.is (Alex Katopodis)
